page.description: Provides access to the tables field rules.
page.discussion: The <TBL>.RULES_GET() method returns a pointer to a Fields Rule object that contains field rule information for the selected table.
page.example: dim tbl as P dim fr as P tbl = table.open("invoice_header") fr = tbl.rules_get() ? fr = V Change_Begin() 'Begin changes to the field rules.
